name: Herta
description:
Double-click to feed 250 bloodstone dust in exchange for a gift. Applies 1 stack of Aurillium Plating if used in the Auric Basin. Herta can only absorb a limited amount of bloodstone dust in a day.

The recovered head of this Exalted continues to glow, presumably with consciousness.
